title: The Legend of Korra Season 1
alternative_title: Avatar: Legend of Korra; The Legend of Korra (Book 1:Air)
description: Book One: Air follows seventeen-year-old Korra from the Southern Water Tribe, and the successor of Avatar Aang from the preceding series Avatar: The Last Airbender, as she travels to the metropolis of Republic City to learn airbending and faces an anti-bender revolutionary group, the "Equalists", led by the masked Amon.
